# PDFAnnotationSquare

**Class**

A rectangle annotation on a page.

## Declaration

```swift
class PDFAnnotationSquare
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFBorder/lineWidth] and [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFBorder/style] properties of the annotation’s associated `PDFBorder` object determines the stroke thickness and style. The [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotation/color] property of the `PDFAnnotation` class determines the stroke color.

## Accessor methods

- **interiorColor()**: Gets the fill color used for drawing the annotation.
- **setInteriorColor(_:)**: Sets the fill color used for drawing the annotation.

## Deprecated Annotation Types

- **PDFAnnotationButtonWidget**: A `PDFAnnotationButtonWidget` object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document. There are three types of buttons available: push button, radio button, and checkbox.
- **PDFAnnotationChoiceWidget**: A `PDFAnnotationChoiceWidget` object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document, in the form of pop-up menus and lists.
- **PDFAnnotationCircle**
- **PDFAnnotationFreeText**: A `PDFAnnotationFreeText` object displays text on a page.
- **PDFAnnotationInk**
- **PDFAnnotationLine**: A `PDFAnnotationLine` object displays a single line on a page.
- **PDFAnnotationLink**
- **PDFAnnotationMarkup**: A `PDFAnnotationMarkup` object appears as highlighting, underlining, or a strikethrough style applied to the text of a document.
- **PDFAnnotationPopup**: A `PDFAnnotationPopup` object provides user interactivity on a PDF page in the form of a pop-up menu.
- **PDFAnnotationStamp**: A `PDFAnnotationStamp` object allows you to display a word or phrase, such as “Confidential,” in a PDF page.
- **PDFAnnotationText**: A `PDFAnnotationText` object displays as an icon (such as a “sticky note”) attached to a specified point in the PDF document.
- **PDFAnnotationTextWidget**: A `PDFAnnotationTextWidget` object allows you to manage the appearance and content of text fields.

## Inherits From

- PDFAnnotation

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
